WorkItem.ClosedComment: Can you post some code where you're running into this, or some other information? We do a lot of editing here as well and aren't running into this, so I need some more information to guide an investigation. Thanks!
WorkItem.Description:
It fails with varying symptoms that include any of:
 - no autocomplete
 - no type hovers or type hovers show `any` instead of real type
 - some types are suddenly not known
 - sudden syntax errors - showing fragment of code that is different than actual contents of file/editor, for example missing first letter

Sometimes it recovers after reopening file but often it doesn't and I need to restart VS.

Comments.Message: i am experiencing the same sorts of problems... although i don't think i have experienced "showing fragment of code that is different than actual contents of file/editor"... one other frequent issue i have is that while coding in TS VS will hang... i have to terminate the process...

Unfortunately I can't, the code is proprietary and the problem doesn't happen outright.

I don't know what other information I can provide, I have requested adding debug output in [1751](https://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/1751).
